registlets.name: Physical Attack Boost
registlets.detail: ATK +1 per level.

registlets.name: Magic Attack Boost
registlets.detail: MATK +1 per level.

registlets.name: Max HP Boost
registlets.detail: MaxHP +10 per level.

registlets.name: Max MP Boost
registlets.detail: MaxMP +1 per level.

registlets.name: Physical Defense Boost
registlets.detail: DEF +1 per level.

registlets.name: Magic Defense Boost
registlets.detail: MDEF +1 per level.

registlets.name: Accuracy Boost
registlets.detail: Accuracy +1 per level.

registlets.name: Dodge Boost
registlets.detail: Dodge +1 per level.

registlets.name: Attack Speed Boost
registlets.detail: ASPD +1 per level.

registlets.name: Magic Speed Boost
registlets.detail: CSPD  +1 per level.

registlets.name: Wayfarer
registlets.detail: Increases EXP Gain by 10% but lowers damage dealt by 14% _(-1% per level)._

registlets.name: Sunbath
registlets.detail: When using Emotions that increase Natural Regen, an additional 25% of MP will be recovered.

registlets.name: Hard Hit Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Hard Hit` by 5%.

registlets.name: Sonic Blade Extender
registlets.detail: Extends the time you must reuse `Sonic Blade` to turn it into `Super Sonic Blade` by 1 seconds per level.

registlets.name: Power Shot Boost
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Power Shot` by 15% per level when [Tumble] is inflicted.

registlets.name: Bullseye Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Bullseye` by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Magic: Arrow Enhancer
registlets.detail: Adds one shot per level to the skill `Magic: Arrows`.

registlets.name: Magic: Wall Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Magic: Wall` by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Smash Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Smash` by 5% is used with knuckles.

registlets.name: Sonic Wave Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Sonic Wave` by 5% per level if used with knuckle.

registlets.name: Twin Slash Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the critical damage from `Twin Slash` by 1% per level.

registlets.name: Cross Parry Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Cross Parry` by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Flash Stab Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Flash Stab` by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Cannon Spear Enhancer
registlets.detail: Adds a 10% chance of inflicting [Flinch] to the first attack.

registlets.name: Issen Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of the second hit of `Issen` by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Pommel Strike Enhancer
registlets.detail: Extends the duration of Paralysis caused by the skill `Pommel Strike` by 1 second per level.

registlets.name: Poison Heal
registlets.detail: 1% per level chance having [Poison] status removed when taking damage inflicted by [Poison].

registlets.name: Cat's Eye
registlets.detail: A MISS hit while you are [Blind] may be turned into a GRAZE hit when possible. _(Chance is unknown)_

registlets.name: Emergency HP Heal
registlets.detail: Instantly restores 11% _(+1% per level)_ of your HP when there is only 25% HP or less due to monster’s attacks. Cooldown: 60 seconds

registlets.name: Emergency MP Heal
registlets.detail: Immediately restores 10 MP per level if there is not enough MP. Cooldown: 60 second.

registlets.name: Neural Control
registlets.detail: Reduces the amount of ASPD lowered due to [Paralysis] by 2% per level.

registlets.name: Final Resistance
registlets.detail: If you get knocked out last in the party, you will squeeze through every last bit of your strength to quickly revive for 6 _(+1 per level)_ seconds before becoming unable to battle again. _*First Aid, Struggle, Revive Droplets Unavailable._

registlets.name: Elemental Trigger Slash
registlets.detail: Converts the element of `Trigger Slash` from fire to that of the weapon equipped.

registlets.name: Spiral Air Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Spiral Air` by 2% per level.

registlets.name: Paralysis Shot Extender
registlets.detail: Extends the duration of buff from the skill `Paralysis Shot` by 1 second per level.

registlets.name: Magic: Lances Catalyst
registlets.detail: Shortens the interval between shots of the skill `Magic: Lances` by 0.1 second per level.

registlets.name: Magic: Blast Catalyst
registlets.detail: Shortens the time to cast the skill `Magic: Blast` by 0.2 second per level.

registlets.name: Power Wave Modifier
registlets.detail: Modifies the effect of `Power Wave` so that it raises normal attack power by 0% instead of extending the range. _*The increment depends on the skill level. 0.5% increase per skill level (lv1 is 0.5% but rounded down), 0.5% increase per registlet level (so max 10% with lv10 on both)._

registlets.name: Earthbind Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Earthbind` by 5% per level if used with knuckles.

registlets.name: Spinning Slash Compress
registlets.detail: Reduces the range of `Spinning Slash` and removes the [Knockback] effect, but raises its power by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Critical Charging Slash
registlets.detail: Lowers the power of `Charging Slash` by 100% and guarantees a critical hit. -10% reduction of power per level.

registlets.name: Dragon Tail Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of the second hit of `Dragon Tail` by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Mega War Cry of Struggle
registlets.detail: Increases the aggro generated by the skill `War Cry of Struggle` by 300 per level.

registlets.name: Static Triple Thrust
registlets.detail: You will remain in the same spot when using the skill `Triple Thrust`.

registlets.name: Magadachi Amulet
registlets.detail: Raises magic damage reduction by the skill `Magadachi` by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Meikyo Shisui Preserver
registlets.detail: The effect from `Meikyo Shisui` remains when using a skill.

registlets.name: Steady Stance
registlets.detail: Reduces damage taken while afflicted with [Stop] by 3% per level if you stand still.

registlets.name: Shared Destiny
registlets.detail: Each party member excluding you will raise ATK and MATK by 1%, but 100% of HP will be lost whenever a member gets knocked out. _*This HP loss could knock player out. No increase in ATK or MATK boost but -1% HP loss per level when a member gets knocked out._

registlets.name: Shell Break Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the chance to inflict [Armor Break] with the skill `Shell Break` by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Forty Winks
registlets.detail: Shortens [Sleep] duration by 10% per level.

registlets.name: Tanker's Pet
registlets.detail: Lowers the damage received by pet by 3%, but greatly increases the damage received by its owner

registlets.name: Last Hero
registlets.detail: Restores 11% of your HP and MP per knocked out party member when you are the only one left. Cooldown: 300 seconds. Restoration increases 1% per level.

registlets.name: Monophobia
registlets.detail: Restores 100 HP per 10 seconds when near a party member, but when not, 100 HP will be lost. _*This HP loss won’t knock player out. Healing range: 4m, range increases by 1m per level._

registlets.name: Pyrexia
registlets.detail: 5% chance of having [Freeze] status removed if you do a normal attack while frozen. Chance removal increases 5% per level.

registlets.name: Impetus
registlets.detail: Reduces movement speed decline due to [Slow] by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Silent Recharge
registlets.detail: increases amount of MP recovered by 5% per level if `MP Charge` is used while afflicted with [Silence].

registlets.name: Attacker's Pet
registlets.detail: Raises the damage dealt by pet by 3%, but greatly decreases it’s owner’s.

registlets.name: Mana Thrash
registlets.detail: Raises normal attack power in exchange for AMPR _*Power increases more with higher AMPR._

registlets.name: Parsimony
registlets.detail: Instead of consuming a triggered auto-item, the item cooldown is doubled. Registlet cooldown: 39 seconds. -1 cooldown per level.

registlets.name: Emergency Repair
registlets.detail: 5% per level of having [Armor Break] status removed when the damage taken increases because of it.

registlets.name: Mana Defuser
registlets.detail: Immediately recovers 100MP per level if you survive Mana Explosion.

registlets.name: Coffe Break
registlets.detail: Restores 10% of your HP when you defeat a monster. Cooldown 29 seconds _(-1 second per level)_

registlets.name: Eagle Eye
registlets.detail: Reduces damage taken from behind _(opposite camera direction)_ by 1% per level. The damage will be further reduced when taken from directly behind.

registlets.name: Savior
registlets.detail: Grants 10-second [Invincible] if you revive when all of your party members get knocked out.

registlets.name: Sword Tempest Extender
registlets.detail: Adds 1 hit to the skill `Sword Tempest`.

registlets.name: Remedial Rampage
registlets.detail: Removes the finishing attack of the skill `Rampage` and restores 50 HP per level.

registlets.name: Smoke Dust Extender
registlets.detail: Extends the duration of buff from the skill `Smoke Dust` by 1 second per level.

registlets.name: Piercing Heavy Smash
registlets.detail: Adds a 5% of Physical Pierce to the skill `Heavy Smash` if used with knuckles.

registlets.name: Phantom Slash Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Phantom Slash` by 5% per level.

registlets.name: Focus Dive Impact
registlets.detail: Turns the skill `Dive Impact` into an attack that pierces through a single target. Resistance to [Dazzled] is shortened by 2 seconds per level.

registlets.name: Pursuit Relief
registlets.detail: Reduces damage taken by 1% per level when you can’t move while afflicted with [Flinch], [Tumble] or [Stun].

registlets.name: Burning Spirit
registlets.detail: Restores MP as much as 5% per level, of your AMPR when taking dmg inflicted by [Ignite].

registlets.name: Bloody Warrior
registlets.detail: Raises normal attack power and AMPR by 5% per level while afflicted with [Bleed].

registlets.name: Monster Hunter
registlets.detail: Restores 100 MP when you defeat a monster. Cooldown: 29 seconds _(-1 second per level)._

registlets.name: Panic
registlets.detail: Restores 11 MP _(+1MP per level)_ every 3 seconds, but all MP will be lost if you get aggro and this Registlet will be suspended for 30 seconds.

registlets.name: Transfer
registlets.detail: Lowers Max MP by 1000, but when you are knocked out, the remaining MP will be shared among your party members. _*Players whose MP gets restored by this effect cannot enjoy the same effect for 180 seconds. -100 Max MP reduction per level._

registlets.name: Berserk Control
registlets.detail: `Rampage` state has a 10% chance of not getting removed per level of `Berserk` acquired.

registlets.name: Decoy Shot Compress
registlets.detail: Halves the duration of `Decoy Shot` but increases the power by 10% (+10% per level).

registlets.name: Frugal Shield Bash
registlets.detail: Restores 10 MP _(+10 MP per level)_ when `Shield Bash` inflicts [Stun].

registlets.name: Extra Recovery
registlets.detail: adds a HP recovery effect to the skill `Recovery`. The amount of HP restored is 10% _(+10% per level)_ of the HP recovered by the `Mini Heal` learned.

registlets.name: Frugal Heal
registlets.detail: Reduces the MP Cost of the skill `Heal` by 100.

registlets.name: Extreme Whack
registlets.detail: Increases the activation rate of `Whack` by 1% _(+1% per level)._

registlets.name: Extreme Concentrate
registlets.detail: Increases the activation rate of `Concentrate` by 1% _(+1% per level)._

registlets.name: Secret Chase ATK Boost
registlets.detail: Increases the activation rate of additional attack of `Secret Chase Attack` by 1% per level of the skill acquired.

registlets.name: Power Resonance
registlets.detail: `Resonance` will only enhance stats that affect firepower, but the enhancement is reduced by 90% _(-8% per level)._

registlets.name: Speed Resonance
registlets.detail: `Resonance` will only enhance stats that affect acceleration, but the enhancement is reduced by 90% _(-8% per level)._

registlets.name: Focus Resonance
registlets.detail: The skill `Resonance` will always choose the buff that boosts Accuracy and Critical Rate, but the Accuracy and Critical Rate boost is reduced by (95-5×level)%. _Note: If multiple Resonance registlets are equipped, the first Resonance registlet equipped will take effect_

registlets.name: Bloody Bite Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Bloody Bite` by 10% _(+10% per level)._

registlets.name: Dominant War Cry
registlets.detail: The activation of `War Cry` will no longer be interrupted by [Fear].

registlets.name: Full Power Qi Charge
registlets.detail: When `Qi Charge` gives no effect, qi will increase by 10% _(+10% per level)_ if the skill is activated using 2000 MP.

registlets.name: Single Meteor Strike
registlets.detail: Reduces the number of meteorites dropped from `Meteor Strike` to 1, but the drop point will no longer be random. It will no longer inflict status ailments either.

registlets.name: Start Dash
registlets.detail: Normal attack has 0 second cooldown for 6 seconds _(+1 second per level)_ when getting aggro from the target monster for the first time.

registlets.name: Secret Combo
registlets.detail: Reduces aggro by 1% _(+1% per level)_ per 1 combo. Better effect with longer combo.

registlets.name: Zero Stance
registlets.detail: Damage dealt with skill activated without using a combo is multiplied by 1.01 _(+0.01 per level)_. _*Does not apply to some skills such as charge skills._

registlets.name: Express Assault Attack
registlets.detail: Removes [Knockback] and [Slow] from `Assault Attack` and increases its power by 10% _(+10% per level)._

registlets.name: Rage Sword Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the power of `Rage Sword` by 10% _(+10% per level)_. Aggro doubles if the target is hostile towards you.

registlets.name: Comrade Familia
registlets.detail: The chance of familiar summoned with `Familia` fleeing is reduced by 1%. Movement becomes 1 second faster for `Advanced Familia`.

registlets.name: Tricky Shadow Walk
registlets.detail: Additional attack of `Shadow Walk` will no longer cause proration.

registlets.name: Mega Royal Heal
registlets.detail: The range of `Royal Heal` effect is increased by 1m _(+1m per level)_, but the amount of HP restores is halved.

registlets.name: Short Performance
registlets.detail: Shortens the duration of dance skill effect by 5 sec. _*Does not apply to `Spirited Dance`._

registlets.name: Arrow Rain Enhancer
registlets.detail: Increase the number of hits of `Arrow Rain` by 1 per level.

registlets.name: Ether Flare Extender
registlets.detail: Doubles the duration of the `Ether Flare` buff, but halves the buff's AMPR gain.

registlets.name: Mana Crystal Catalyst
registlets.detail: Reduces the casting time of `Mana Crystal` by 10% per level, but the amount of MP recovered gets reduced by 100.

registlets.name: Assassin Stab Enhancer
registlets.detail: Raises the base multiplier of `Assassin Stab` by 1% per level. Furthermore, if the `Assassin Stab` performed is a `Back Stab`, the accuracy of the attack increases by 10% per level.

registlets.name: Holy Light Retribution
registlets.detail: There is a 1% chance that a light element `Magic: Finale` will activate when `Holy Light` hits the target. The skill level of the `Magic: Finale` is equal to the regislet's level.

registlets.name: Focus Demon Claw
registlets.detail:
Reduces the base multiplier of `Demon Claw` by 100%, but the skill becomes a single target skill instead of an AOE.

_Note: The base multiplier of `Demon Claw` is (100 + 10×skill level). With this registlet, that base multiplier becomes (10×skill level)._

registlets.name: Silent P. Defense
registlets.detail: Reduces the aggro generated when `P. Defense` is successful by 10% per level.

registlets.name: Binding Strike Modifier
registlets.detail: Modifies `Binding Strike` so that it inflicts [Stun] to the target only and the [Stop] effect is removed. In this case, the [Stun] chance is (10×skill level)%.

registlets.name: Heal Bank
registlets.detail:
The amount of HP recovered by `Mini Heal` and `Heal` is halved.
This regislet gives the user the ability to accumulate Heal Stacks every 3 seconds.
The max Heal Stacks that can be accumulated is equal to the registlet's level.
When using `Mini Heal` or `Heal` on an ally, Heal Stacks are consumed instead of MP and the skill's cast time is removed.
The extra MP cost due to `Asura Aura` is still paid even when using the Heal Stacks.

registlets.name: Chancy Trap
registlets.detail:
Enables trap skills from the `Hunter` skill tree to be set at the target's feet, but if the trap activates immediately, you will also be affected.

Self Ailment Duration due to Traps:
Sleep Trap: Sleep @15 sec
Bear Trap: Stop @10 sec
Land Mine: Ignite @10 sec
Dark Trap: Lethargy @10 sec

registlets.name: Guitarist
registlets.detail: Shortens the time for a song effect to increase when used continuously by 1 second per level, but aggro and damage received while singing are increased by 10%.

registlets.name: Fighter's Magic: Impact
registlets.detail: Changes the proration dealt by `Magic: Impact` to physical proration

registlets.name: Maximizer Converter
registlets.detail: Switches `Maximizer` to activate `MP Charge` instead when used alone (i.e., not part of a combo) and the condition for instant activation is not met.

registlets.name: Perfect Triple Thrust
registlets.detail: Restores 10×level MP if `Triple Thrust` is successfully activated without taking any damage when used alone.

registlets.name: Evasive Floating Kick
registlets.detail: Gain [Invincible] for 1 second if `Floating Kick` is activated while moving

registlets.name: Mega Demon Wind Shuriken
registlets.detail: MP Cost of `Demon Wind Shuriken` increases by 200-100×level, but, in exchange, the number of times the shuriken can hit without reduced damage is increased by 1.

registlets.name: Dragon Fire Release
registlets.detail: The time to cast `Fire Release` is increased by 1 second, but the skill gains 2.5×level Magic Pierce. This increase in Magic Pierce doubles if `Blazing Explosion` is triggered.

registlets.name: Protection Aegis
registlets.detail: When `Protection` is activated, the `Aegis` you've acquired will also be activated at the same time.

registlets.name: Frugal Breathwork
registlets.detail: Reduces the MP Cost of `Breathwork` by 100

registlets.name: Fire Talent
registlets.detail:
If the effect of a skill changes based on element, equipping this registlet forces that skill to use the Fire element effect.

_Note: This does not provide awaken element. It just changes the effect of the skill!_

registlets.name: Water Talent
registlets.detail:
If the effect of a skill changes based on element, equipping this registlet forces that skill to use the Water element effect.

_Note: This does not provide awaken element. It just changes the effect of the skill!_

registlets.name: Wind Talent
registlets.detail:
If the effect of a skill changes based on element, equipping this registlet forces that skill to use the Wind element effect.

_Note: This does not provide awaken element. It just changes the effect of the skill!_

registlets.name: Earth Talent
registlets.detail:
If the effect of a skill changes based on element, equipping this registlet forces that skill to use the Earth element effect.

_Note: This does not provide awaken element. It just changes the effect of the skill!_

registlets.name: Light Talent
registlets.detail:
If the effect of a skill changes based on element, equipping this registlet forces that skill to use the Light element effect.

_Note: This does not provide awaken element. It just changes the effect of the skill!_

registlets.name: Dark Talent
registlets.detail:
If the effect of a skill changes based on element, equipping this registlet forces that skill to use the Dark element effect.

_Note: This does not provide awaken element. It just changes the effect of the skill!_

registlets.name: Emergency Care
registlets.detail: Reduces the MP Aggro triggered by "First Aid" by 1 per level

registlets.name: Direct Sonic Thrust
registlets.detail: The skill `Sonic Thrust` loses its swift effect but gains an effect that ignores evasion in return.

registlets.name: Sprint Sheathe Remover
registlets.detail: Sheathing while moving will no longer occur

registlets.name: Unsheather Wind Release
registlets.detail: Adds 5% magic pierce per level to the skill `Wind Release` and when the skill changes, an unsheathe attack attribute is added.

registlets.name: Extreme Chronos Shift
registlets.detail:
`Chronos Shift` can be activated even if there is not enough MP by consuming HP.
(60-10×level)% HP required per 100MP that you're short of.

registlets.name: Meteor Magic: Crash
registlets.detail: The metorites from `Magic: Crash` become much smaller in size, but the time of impact is shortened by (0.1×level - 0.1) seconds and all the meteorites will drop down even when not hitting the target

registlets.name: Moonlight Crescent Saber
registlets.detail: While `Crescent Saber` is active, all aggro generated will be reduced by 15% per level. This effect does not activate if you are being targeted.

registlets.name: Target Declaration
registlets.detail: When you are drawing the enemy's attention (aggro), you will declare it through Party Chat. If it is a Guild RAID, you will declare it through Say Chat.

registlets.name: Check Out Notice
registlets.detail: When you get knocked out, you will declare it through Party Chat. If it is a Guild RAID, you will declare it through Say Chat.

registlets.name: Instructor
registlets.detail: Sets your own EXP Gain to 0% to increase the EXP Gain of the party member with the lowest level by 1% per level.

registlets.name: Healing Hands
registlets.detail: Alleviates the reduced recovery of Heal-related Registlets by 10% per level.

registlets.name: Iron Fist
registlets.detail: Guard Break increases by 1% per level when using barehanded or knuckles (main only). The amount increased will be tripled if the sub-weapon slot is empty.

registlets.name: Magic: Storm Extender
registlets.detail:
Reduces the multiplier of `Magic: Storm` by 50%, but increases the storm's duration by (level) seconds.

_Note: The multiplier is not halved, it is reduced. If the original multiplier is 200%, it becomes 150% with this registlet._

registlets.name: Parrier Storm Blaze
registlets.detail: A Guard check is added to the skill `Storm Blaze`. A successful Guard with the skill will double the amount of MP recovered.

registlets.name: Sneak Attack Timer
registlets.detail:
The skill `Sneak Attack` changes into a time-based buff instead of a fixed amount of uses.
The buff duration is (`Sneak Attack`'s skill level) seconds.

registlets.name: Aura Blade Force
registlets.detail:
When using `Aura Blade` while the targeted enemy is out of the skill's AOE range, the skill will releases a single attack shock wave towards the targeted enemy.
The shock wave deals (level×10)% of the skill's original damage.

registlets.name: Distant Buster Lance
registlets.detail:
Increases the multiplier of `Buster Lance` by 10% per level.
The range and distance at which the multiplier of `Buster Lance` starts to decrease is increased, making it always a long-range attack.

registlets.name: Invincible Dauntless
registlets.detail:
`Dauntless` accumulates 1 second faster, but the count will decrease by (12 - level×3) when taking damage.
The count will not decrease if the damage is blocked with Guard or certain Mononofu skills.
The count will also not decrease when taking damage if you have 100 `Dauntless` stacks.

registlets.name: Evasion Set
registlets.detail:
Evasion becomes usable even with equipment that doesn't allow it.
This registlet gives 2 manual evasions or 1 auto evasion (10 sec cooldown).
This effect will not apply if you are equipped with an equipment that already enables Evasion.

registlets.name: Damage Check
registlets.detail: Displays an additional warning message when stepping on a warning area if the damage from the enemy attack exceeds 50% of your current HP.

registlets.name: Role Model
registlets.detail:
Greatly suppresses your own damage output to increase your party's EXP Gain by (level)%.
While equipped with this registlet, your damage is capped to 1% of the enemy's HP.

registlets.name: Knight's Intuition
registlets.detail:
Anticipate increases by (level)% if a one-handed sword is equipped.
Equipping a shield will triple the amount increased.
